metadata.title: CVE-2021-21144 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Tab Groups in Google Chrome prior to 88.0.4324.146allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
